Enki teaches Inanna  
"Only holy Inanna received the craft of the"  
carpenter  
copper smith  
scribe  
smith ?  
leather worker  
builder  
reed worker  
wisdom:  
shepherd's hut  
the sheepfold  
knowledge to pile up glowing charcoals
